Title: Miracle Man
Plot: A young man who has the power to heal people with his touch begins to question his gift when people start dying after he has supposedly healed them.
GuestStars: R.D. Call, Scott Bairstow, Chilton Crane, Campbell Lane, Howard Storey, Lisa Ann Beley, Alex Doduk, Walter Marsh, Iris Quinn Bernard, Roger Haskett, George Gerdes, Dennis Lipscomb
